I then proceeded to buy him and play him to figure out if I was just on tilt. F that, I built him support, tank, AD and AP, and nearly wrecked face everytime. His base damage is good enough to build anything, his w gives a move speed and atk speed boost, his E literally doubles his AD on hit, his ult and Q have 100% ap scaling, with one being 30 seconds and the other up to 16, respectively. Now with 45% cdr, almost halves those, making him far more deadly. This champ is the epitomy of anti-fun.
